text: Jesus Torres Fernandez (born May 2, 1960 in Madrid) is a wheelchair basketball athlete from Spain. He has a physical disability: he is a 2-point wheelchair basketball player. He played wheelchair basketball at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. His team was third. They beat the United States 66-60 to finish third. == References == Category:Living people Category:1960 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Spanish wheelchair basketball players Category:2 point player Category:Sportspeople from Madrid
title: Jesús Torres Fernández
